body.p: Well between Kadesh and Bered where Hagar, pregnant with Ishmael, was confronted by the angel of the Lord (Gn 16:7-14). The name given to the site means “the well of the Living One who sees me,” referring to God’s appearance to Sarai’s servant girl. Later, it became a frequent watering place for Isaac on his travels (Gn 24:62; 25:11).
